title: Coca Bag, possibly 1200
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave; warp selvage for bag opening, reinforced by overcasting
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Flat bag woven in stripes of red, green, yellow and brown. Hand sewn at sides to form bag. Red tassels at corners.

possibly 1200. Medium: wool
